attributes.action: remove Jacqui Smith from any form of Public office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jacqui Smith is an incompetent, hateful and dangerous idiot. Her policies are harmful to the British general public and often borderline unlawful. This woman should be removed from office for the good of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
